html: #HealthDisparities in communities of color are caused by: Lack of access to healthy food Inadequate medical care Pollution & environmental factors We must fight these systemic injustices so our communities are healthier! #MinorityHealthMonth #NMHM19
text:
#HealthDisparities in communities of color are caused by:
Lack of access to healthy food
Inadequate medical care
Pollution & environmental factors
We must fight these systemic injustices so our communities are healthier! #MinorityHealthMonth #NMHM19

html: Latinos live in communities with more pollution -- & dirty air & water impacts the health of our kids and leads to more chronic health issues & pre-existing conditions. This #MinorityHealthMonth, let’s pledge to fight pollution in our communities. #NMHM19https://www.npr.org/sections/health-shots/2019/03/11/702348935/study-finds-racial-gap-between-who-causes-air-pollution-and-who-breathes-it …

html: In 2015, 9 innocent people were gunned down at the Emanuel AME Church in Charleston, SC. The gun used was sold even though the background check wasn't completed. It's past time for thoughts and prayers. We need action. #HR1112 is an important first step.pic.twitter.com/tW3nmaD9wV
text:
In 2015, 9 innocent people were gunned down at the Emanuel AME Church in Charleston, SC.

The gun used was sold even though the background check wasn't completed.
 
It's past time for thoughts and prayers.
 
We need action. #HR1112 is an important first step.pic.twitter.com/tW3nmaD9wV

html: I will keep fighting for commonsense solutions to keep our communities safe and prevent tragedies caused by gun violence while strengthening mental health services in this country.
text: I will keep fighting for commonsense solutions to keep our communities safe and prevent tragedies caused by gun violence while strengthening mental health services in this country.

html: The majority of people with mental illness do not engage in violence against others, and most violence is caused by factors other than mental illness. It is important to remember these individuals are far more likely to be the victims of violence than the perpetrators.
text: The majority of people with mental illness do not engage in violence against others, and most violence is caused by factors other than mental illness. It is important to remember these individuals are far more likely to be the victims of violence than the perpetrators.

html: We must keep guns out of the hands of people who should not have access to them, such as domestic abusers and those with violent histories, and it is critical we do this without stigmatizing those with mental illness.
text: We must keep guns out of the hands of people who should not have access to them, such as domestic abusers and those with violent histories, and it is critical we do this without stigmatizing those with mental illness.

html: This bipartisan bill would require background checks for all gun purchases, with some reasonable exceptions, and is one of many long overdue steps forward to begin to address this epidemic, which claims over 36,000 lives every year on average.
text: This bipartisan bill would require background checks for all gun purchases, with some reasonable exceptions, and is one of many long overdue steps forward to begin to address this epidemic, which claims over 36,000 lives every year on average.

html: Citrus Alert: 1/15/19 6 pm Lockdown lifted. College closed. Evening classes are canceled. Check http://www.citruscollege.edu  for updates about Wed. 1/16/19 operations.
text: Citrus Alert: 1/15/19 6 pm Lockdown lifted. College closed. Evening classes are canceled. Check http://www.citruscollege.edu  for updates about Wed. 1/16/19 operations.

html: The Citrus College lockdown has been lifted. Thank you for your patience. Refer to @CitrusCollege for information on classes.
text: The Citrus College lockdown has been lifted.  Thank you for your patience.  Refer to @CitrusCollege for information on classes.

html: Citrus College is still on lock down, however surrounding streets, including Citrus, Barranca and Foothill are open for traffic.
text: Citrus College is still on lock down, however surrounding streets, including Citrus, Barranca and Foothill are open for traffic.

html: Students are not being transported off of the Citrus College Campus. We are still making sure the campus is safe before the lockdown is lifted.
text: Students are not being transported off of the Citrus College Campus.  We are still making sure the campus is safe before the lockdown is lifted.

html: We have one person in custody re the threat to Citrus College. Please be patient as we are continuing our investigation to ensure the safety of students and staff.
text: We have one person in custody re the threat to Citrus College. Please be patient as we are continuing our investigation to ensure the safety of students and staff.

html: UPDATE: Lockdown lifted on APU's campus. You no longer need to shelter in place. Though police activity continues at Citrus College, the all clear has been given for APU. Thank you for your patience, cooperation, and understanding to help keep our community safe.
text: UPDATE: Lockdown lifted on APU's campus. You no longer need to shelter in place. Though police activity continues at Citrus College, the all clear has been given for APU. Thank you for your patience, cooperation, and understanding to help keep our community safe.

html: We have one person detained at Citrus College. The campus is still on lock down, asking the public to continue to stay away from campus.
text: We have one person detained at Citrus College.  The campus is still on lock down, asking the public to continue to stay away from campus.

html: We are assisting @Glendora_PD on a situation at @CitrusCollege & we also have officers on-campus at @azusapacific to ensure the safety of the community. We ask that you avoid the area- multiple streets are blocked. We will keep you updated #azusa #glendora #lockdown
text: We are assisting @Glendora_PD on a situation at @CitrusCollege & we also have officers on-campus at @azusapacific to ensure the safety of the community. We ask that you avoid the area- multiple streets are blocked. We will keep you updated #azusa #glendora #lockdown

html: Citrus College is still on lock down. We have officers actively investigating on scene. We will be posting periodic updates on Twitter. All updates from GPD will come from there. Do not go to Citrus College. Twitter: @glendora_pd
text: Citrus College is still on lock down.  We have officers actively investigating on scene.  We will be posting periodic updates on Twitter.  All updates from GPD will come from there.  Do not go to Citrus College.  Twitter:  @glendora_pd

html: GPD is still actively investigating a threat at Citrus College. We will provide more info as we have it. Please stay out of the area.
text: GPD is still actively investigating a threat at Citrus College. We will provide more info as we have it. Please stay out of the area.

html: Shelter-in-Place Update: We are continuing to monitor the situation and will post any updates here and at https://bit.ly/2Hca5cc . Please continue to shelter in place if you are on the Azusa campus.

html: URGENT: APU Community at the Azusa campus: Please shelter-in-place. The campus is on lockdown. If you are on campus, please remain where you are. If off campus, please stay away from the area. Glendora PD is investigating a threat at Citrus College. Updates to follow.

html: I’ve been on the Intelligence Committee for over 10 years. On terrorism and other threats, I’ve received more briefings from FBI, CIA, and DHS than I could count. How many times have any of them said we need a wall across the southern border? Zero.
text:
I’ve been on the Intelligence Committee for over 10 years. On terrorism and other threats, I’ve received more briefings from FBI, CIA, and DHS than I could count.

How many times have any of them said we need a wall across the southern border?

Zero.

html: Dr. Susan La Flesche Picotte was the first Native American woman to earn a medical degree in the U.S. She worked as a physician around the clock for the Omaha reservation & was a social reformer who advocated for public health & well-being on reservations. #WomensHistoryMonthpic.twitter.com/1CBusYHGs8
